list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a type of aircraft which derives both lift and propulsion from one or more sets of horizontally revolving overhead rotors. It is capable of moving vertically and horizontally, the direction of motion being controlled by the pitch of the rotor blades.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the Coast Guard helicoptered a compressor to one ship
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người bảo vệ bờ biển máy bay trực thăng một máy nén khí cho một con tàu
